H0.text: Which Flemish Baroque painter’s Antwerp home is now a museum. Anthony Van Dyck

H1.text: Which Flemish Baroque painter’s Antwerp home is now a museum. Jacob Jordaens

H2.text: Which Flemish Baroque painter’s Antwerp home is now a museum. Frans Snyders

H3.text: Which Flemish Baroque painter’s Antwerp home is now a museum. Rubens

A4.text: Now the Rubenshuis Museum, the Italian-influenced villa in the centre of Antwerp accommodated his workshop, where he and his apprentices made most of the paintings, and his personal art collection and library, both among the most extensive in Antwerp.
